response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item carries a unique value of $15,000 to me, encapsulating years of innovation and dedication. I am offering this exceptional piece to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is an opportunity to own a masterpiece that not only serves its intended purpose but also adds a touch of prestige and exclusivity to your collection. Please let me know if you would like to explore this offer further.", "product_price": 14000}
